attributes.action: make Examination boards review their marking schemes so they consider disabled sport in the curriculum for A levels and GCSES physical education qualifications
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hi my names Kellie Turner i was part of the student union in Wolverhampton College while i was studying at this particular college i have noticed alot of segregation of disabled people within the qualifications that exam boards offer. i want this to change and i want them to consider the adapted sports that disabled people play within the qualification of Physical education.
